# 2021 Office Cleaning Schedule Set-Up

There is no time like the present to establish a 2021 office cleaning schedule. While every facility wants a clean, safe, and healthy work environment, the challenge lies in its consistency.

When employees already have so many responsibilities, keeping the environment clean can be a tough “ask” over time. Through three generations, The Heiser Group has experience in collaborating with facility managers to make the process a little easier.

## The Importance of Creating a 2021 Office Cleaning Schedule

Similar to the New Year’s resolutions linked to frequent exercise and healthy eating, saying that we will do something is easy. The follow-through is where the challenge lies.

Creating a commercial cleaning schedule is no different. This is why it all starts with a basic structure.

## How to Establish a Sustainable 2021 Office Cleaning Schedule

A lot goes into establishing a [2021 office cleaning schedule](https://www.heisergroup.com/commercial-cleaning), especially one that employees will adhere to thoroughly. The Heiser Group has a few, quick tips to ease the burden.

### MAKE EVERYONE RESPONSIBLE

The best way to make sure everything gets cleaned is to enlist everyone to help. Assuming employees clean up their own messes and maintain an organized workspace, much of the surface-level work is already done.

### DEVELOP A ROTATING CHORES LIST

Outside of personal space, offices should develop a rotating chores list. Under this philosophy, team members will switch off on weekly tasks.

This eliminates favoritism and office politics for ensured equality. In addition, employees will have a clear idea of their weekly responsibilities, so nothing is left unchecked.

### MAKE TOOLS READILY AVAILABLE

Regardless of the job, we all need the right tools to do it efficiently. To facilitate your environment’s 2021 industrial cleaning regimen, there should be a supply closet filled with the necessary tools.

These can include paper towels, sanitizer wipes, and cleaning sprays. Having these stocked in an easily available location helps employees to access them without trouble.

## Consult Commercial Professionals Regarding Your 2021 Office Cleaning Schedule

The easiest way to maintain a clean, healthy office space is to bring on the help of professional commercial cleaners. The cleaning experts at The Heiser Group utilize [a three-step process](https://www.heisergroup.com/results) to make sure nothing falls through the cracks and your office is always spotless.

### **THE HEISER GROUP’S THREE-STEP PROCESS**

### STEP 1: EVALUATION

The Heiser Group evaluates your facility, tailoring our approach to _your_ specific cleaning needs. Then, we put together a customized cleaning strategy that fits your schedule, your budget, and your facilities.

Our team provides professional expertise, honesty, and integrity. We have a no-nonsense approach so the person that customizes your cleaning schedule is your main contact throughout our entire working relationship.

### STEP 2: GET THE RIGHT TOOLS

Next, The Heiser Group obtains the proper equipment and assembles the right team for your customized cleaning strategy.

We utilize only the highest quality equipment and implement eco-friendly, safe cleaning chemicals for the best, and healthiest results.

### STEP 3: CUSTOMER SERVICE

We take pride in providing elite customer service with rapid response times to make sure all of your needs are addressed. Along with our on-site supervision, both Owner David Heiser and General Manager Matthew Lystila perform quarterly audits of each facility.

This process ensures that nothing is overlooked and guarantees 100% satisfaction day in and day out.

To establish your 2021 office cleaning schedule, [**contact the commercial cleaning specialists at The Heiser Group today.**](https://www.heisergroup.com/contact)
